page.title: 12Events around Gt.Asby
page.content: Events In this sparsely populated area there are very few events of note, and no traditional festivals. Even the village bonfire failed to take place last year. Asby has a wooden "Clubroom" which hosts such events as dances, wine-and-cheese evenings, bring-and-buy sales,Christmas parties and very occasional concerts. The village school puts on concerts and plays, and sometimes a barbeque or garden party is held in what was the vicarage. Organisations in the area include the Womens Institute, Mothers' Union and Young Farmers Club,which organise events, but these are usually held in Appleby.Motor sport is popular in this region and several motor clubs use the narrow roads and tracks for their rallies.
